entry.value: update #{mySQLTwitterTable} set logiRemoved = 'P', updatedVolDate = current_timestamp() where tweetID = ${tweetID}
logiRemoved = 'N' and reportingDate >= date_sub(now(), interval #{intervalDays} day)
insert into #{mySQLLogTable} (logDate, logModule, logModule2, logLevel, logMessage) values (current_timestamp(), #{mySQLLogModule}, $NiFiModule, $logLevel, $logMessage)
